channel.title: Adam J Wolf
channel.description: Recent content on Adam J Wolf

item.title: About
item.description: Adam J Wolf Hello! Thanks for coming to my little place on the internet. Please stick around and enjoy my views and opinions on technology, programming and design. Most of my work is behind corporate firewalls but you can find some of it in public here, here and here. A summary of them is here as well. I’m glad you stoped by. If you have any questions or want to comment, please find me on Twitter and fire away.
